description: Palindromes whose square root is a palindrome.
comments: Always contain an odd number of digits.Needs longer b-file - _N. J. A. Sloane_, Dec 18 2015.
links: N. J. A. Sloane, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..412 (Based on R. J. Mathar's b-file for A057135).
example: a(8) = 14641 since 14641 = 121^2 and 121 is also a palindrome
author: _Henry Bottomley_, Aug 12 2000
